hero.title: Visual mapping of your web browsing
hero.text: Researching a specific interest? Get a mind map of the web sites and resources you visit and save. The map will visualize by clustering sub-topics and generating suggestions by affinity.

facets.title: Surface themes
facets.text: MyMap auto-categorizes and clusters the sites you visit. You don’t have to organize anything to take away insights about your browsing behavior.

facets.title: Short-term memory aid
facets.text: MyMap keeps track of any site you’ve bookmarked or might want to remember. You can even attach screenshots, notes, or highlighted text to stash what matters.

facets.title: Get personalized suggestions based on affinity
facets.text: See what other people are looking at and searching for within your personal MyMap, and discover more of the web.

facets.title: Share with others
facets.text: Share all or parts of your MyMap with others. They can add comments directly in your map, and pin their own suggestions, too.
